page.title: 14St.Davids Fire Station
page.content: There are 11 part_time workers in the fire station and 2 full time workers. They are Jimmy Jones,and Barry Owen. There are two kinds of false alarms in a fire station _ malicious and good intent.Over the last ten years they have recieved 78 good intent alarms and 23 malicious alarms.The fire engine is capable of going at 70mph. Going to a fire the speed depends on what the limits are and how busy the traffic is.The fire engine has never broken down going to a fire.They have only used breathing apparatus once,in the Amoco disaster back in November 1983.In 1984 they had 104 calls and so far this year they've had 38 calls.The fire engine cost Â£33,000 and over another Â£2,500 for breathing apparatus,ladders..etc.The fire engine has 15 years in the force then it is sold off.
